post.body: WOOOO
I'd make a list if I thought my wife would actually look at it!
ah yes, go for it! She if she'll throw in a flask too!
are you referring to the "flask?"
can't tell! I'm looking. Looks like it has spell check now. Not sure what else.
haha...sarcasm is always better with a little snow.
@jaqchapman @fellowdreamer what's LMAO?
good idea on webdings, your greek prof will never know what hit him!
Icould do american typewriter.
@irobyn I'm actually using Georgia.
or maybe these?http://bit.ly/3TpLD0
I've got shure's, they're great.
You got it!
Wow - you're a machine!
What!? Then we'll have to decide whether we can see you...I haven't heard from hoopes yet, but I'm really hoping tues works.
how did that reclaiming go for you? Where you in "plain" dress?
your dinner sounds great!
is rachel going to be there with you?
congrats!
you think it's her first trip...? ;)
Sweet - it'll be a little canton reunion!
yes, of course, but mainly after the 30th. We are going to try and see the hoopes' on Tuesday the 23rd. would that work?
Yes, I heard he was in LA but I always seem to miss him when he's doing stuff around down. Have you seen him?
nice!
haven't tried it yet, will have to wait till after christmas break to download it. I can't wait to try it out though. You?
- sorry about that, I'll stay through the worst of it if that helps any?
line from hades...which one, isn't that every line in an airport at this time of year?
@JayaOhio the rumors are true.
send me your number, it's going to be tight but I'd like to if we can.
thanks for the suggestion - I just turned on "songs of love and hate!." Not sure about the earrings, but def. birks.
it'd be more bitter if you weren't also going to be in OH.
wordiness, wordiness, why on earth and I so wordy?
For the record, the bezel interface on Quicksilver is the quickest.
Downloading the new version of stainless.
Thinking abotu how to celebrate once I"m done.
I'm really glad I'm re-reading this thing, I can't believe how much I missed the first run through.
Great, the book I needed for my paper just arrived via Interlibrary loan. Just in time! SIKE.
Comis Sans it is, Ihope the prof won't mind! ;)
Off to bed - lots of grading needs to be done tomorrow and then a little fun...
Just finished the last episode of the wire season five - what an amazing show.
JUST BLOGGED: Reclaiming the Power of Primitive Quakerism for the 21st Century: Robin, Martin and I.. http://tinyurl.com/6fnqn2
Taking some time to try and relax. A little jazz and McClendon's "Ethics," seem like a fitting combo.

JUST BLOGGED: Finishing Two Quarters with Everett Cattell:
Image by Midnight-digital via Flickr.. http://tinyurl.com/5zwxhn
On to grading!
From Weird Fishes Playing With Yogurt: Playing With Yogurt http://tinyurl.com/5kdvk6
Got way too much work to do for this to be considered a break.
Listening to my favorite album of the year -- Tell Tale Signs - Dylan.
From Weird Fishes Banannas!: Banannas! http://tinyurl.com/5cs2lr
Dreaming of a white Christmas.
Fuller's library is shutting down 28(?) hours of operation each week, not including it being closed on sunday too. reason - the economy.
25 degrees in OH. Visiting my mom and now off to see my dad - the grandparents are eating up these cheeks http://tinyurl.com/87yer7
Dress-Down Friday | Happy First Birthday L Edition: This is a “Dress-Down Friday” in honor of our da.. http://is.gd/cyAA
Happy Birthday to our daughter L. She was born 12/19/2007 at 4:20am. It's been an incredibly wonderful year with her.
Made it to Ohio after 12 hours of travel! Arrived in Toledo at 2am last night. It's currently raining ice.
Leaving for Burbank Airport, OH here we come.
Decided to not take the laptop with me, uploading work to online services and going to rely on "the cloud."
Last min. packing, lots of extra stuff to do when flying with a baby! AHHH....
L turns one year old on Friday. I can't believe it.
New Gathering In Light: 3rd Edition: Three years ago I bought gatheringinlight.com and started hosting my own we.. http://is.gd/ccmi
Just got the book "Reasong Together: A Conversation on Homosexuality," by T. Grimsrud & M. Nation two mennos who debate http://is.gd/cbJW
